input.sentences: these were some pictures i took in a dome near my home .
the inside looked like you were on drugs . it looked pretty cool .
everyone blending in with each other . i almost lost everyone !
where did you go ? some on guys..
the place overall was very cool .
output.sentences: The kids were excited to have the big bouncy house in their backyard.
It offered a mesmerizing visual display with its cool graphics.
The kids spent a lot of time exploring the cool place.
Some of them even lost their way.
It wasn't long, though, before they found and exit and walked into the daylight beyond.
